description.lang: A secure, connected home doesnt have to be a complex project and it should be future proof. In conjunction with Icontrol Networks, Novatel Wireless has developed a simple approach for security dealers and providers with the MiFi Secure.Designed for simplicity, the MiFi Secure SA 1100 communication module fits easily inside Simon XT/XTi security panels for an instant 3G upgrade and enables the connected home leveraging the Icontrol One Interactive Security and Home Automation platform.
Lifeline.On a reset of the controller, the Device Reset Locally command is sent.
